cards.markdown:
[![](https://i0.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2007/01/365990512_ce9f4d59bd_m.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/365990512/ "photo sharing") [Having a bad day](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/365990512/) Originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
Dear Lord, I came into work this morning, full of enthusiasm for the week and got hit with a shitstorm that I can do little to correct personally. Arrgh. I’ve only left my desk for about 10 minutes the whole day, and only achieved a fraction of what I wanted to do. This, I suspect, is the downside of having a job you’re really passionate about. The highs are higher, but the lows are lower. I just want to go home, dive into a bath of whisky and never come out again.
